item.title: Federal Agents Pepper Spray Protesters During Tucson Taco Shop Raid
item.description: See video from the scene as ICE officers attempted to disperse a crowd in the street outside the taqueria.

item.title: ‘Substantial Risk’: Mohican Young Star Academy Admissions Suspended as State Investigates
item.description: Weeks after The Marshall Project - Cleveland found escalating violence, Ohio’s embattled youth treatment center is once again facing scrutiny.

item.title: Dozens Locked in Hinds County’s Jails Without an Indictment — Some for Over a Year
item.description: The newly appointed federal receiver has asked the county’s district attorney to move more cases, while the DA has asked the county for more money.

item.title: In the Shadow of an Immigrant Detention Center, a Small House Offers Refuge
item.description: Amid rising ICE arrests, volunteers provide aid — a meal, a bed, gas money — to anyone visiting someone detained in remote rural Georgia.

item.title: Why New Orleans Became Trump’s Newest Immigration Target
item.description: Recent legal changes, a Trump-friendly governor and a large immigration detention infrastructure could make the New Orleans crackdown easier for the a...
